alert.note: Alert for Blount; Etowah; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Blount, northern Etowah and northwestern St. Clair Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 330 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Walnut Grove to near Dallas. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Oneonta, Attalla, Springville, Cleveland, Dallas, Ashville, Locust Fork, Steele, Altoona, Snead, Susan Moore, Walnut Grove, Reece City, Trafford, Allgood, Fairview, Rosa and County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
